title: Sergei Skripal recovering 'rapidly': hospital
text:
Sergei Skripal recovering 'rapidly': hospital 10:37am EDT - 00:52 
Former Russian double agent Sergei Skripal is no longer in critical condition, according to the British hospital treating him, a day after his daughter made her first public statement since the incident in which they were both poisoned.   
Former Russian double agent Sergei Skripal is no longer in critical condition, according to the British hospital treating him, a day after his daughter made her first public statement since the incident in which they were both poisoned.  //reut.rs/2He0AWf
